titles.title: If Ye Live By The Spirit And The Spirit Is True

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If ye live by the spirit and the spirit is true
Then fulfill ye my joy
That ye be like-minded, having the same love,
Of one accord, of one mind.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory.
But in lowliness of mind
Let each esteem others better than themselves.
This is the mind of Jesus Christ.
